title: Studio apartment in Pet-friendly Building! 1739 Pine St #44
posting_body: This apartment is in the Lower Pacific Heights neighborhood in San Francisco.
Nearby parks include Lafayette Square, O'Farrell-Larkin Mini Park and Cottage Row Mini Park.
It is also a 14 minute walk from the J CHURCH, the KT INGLESIDE/THIRD and the L TARAVAL at the Metro Powell Station/Outbound stop.
Nearby schools include Redding Elementary School, San Francisco Flex Academy and Cathedral School For Boys.
The closest grocery stores are Franklin Market, Enoteca VIno Nostro, Whole Foods Market, and Trader Joe's.
Nearby coffee shops include Han's Coffee Shop, Golden Coffee Shop and Cup A Joe Coffeehouse.
There are 444 restaurants within a 15 minute walk including Bellissimo Pizza, Bite and Colombini Bistro Restaurant.
The Lower Pacific Heights area has a bike score of 77 out of 100, there are excellent bike lanes so biking is convenient for most trips.
Two most recent pay stubs (or circle direct deposits on your bank statements)
Positive rental and credit history (minimum 600 credit score required)
Gross monthly income = 3 times the rent
